alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 12:40AM AKST until November 29 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING FOR TURNAGAIN PASS... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Winds gusting 15 to 25 mph. * WHERE...Turnagain Pass. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers Tuesday night will become steady snow Tuesday morning. Snow will intensify by mid morning with snow rates up to one inch per hour possible Wednesday afternoon through early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
